## RenderPropFunction type

A function that takes the injected remirror params and returns JSX to render.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RenderPropFunction<GExtension extends AnyExtension = any> = (params: InjectedRemirrorProps<GExtension>) => JSX.Element;
```
